price: የኢንጅልም ባለቤቶች በውስጡ አላህ ባወረደው ሕግ ይፍረዱ፡፡ አላህም ባወረደው የማይፈርድ ሰው እነዚያ አመጸኞች እነርሱ ናቸው፡፡
arabic: وَلۡيَحۡكُمۡ أَهۡلُ ٱلۡإِنجِيلِ بِمَآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ فِيهِۚ وَمَن لَّمۡ يَحۡكُم بِمَآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡفَٰسِقُونَ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walyaḥkum ahlu al-injīli bimā anzala al-lahu fīhi waman lam yaḥkum bimā anzala al-lahu fa-ulāika humu al-fāsiqūna
